title: iNaiyaDi undaE
sahitya:
(rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)   
  iNaiyaDi unadE tuNaiyAghum murugA


anupallavi

  aNai pOl aDuttiDum allalait-taDuttE avani tanilE nAn kavaliyurAdirukka
			(rAg  sOhini)


caraNam 1    ellaiyE illAda tollai mighu vAzhvil nalla nilai kulaiyAdum naliyAdum tAnirukka
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  cenjuruTi)Aa:D2 S R2 G3 M1 P D2 N2  Av:  N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S N2 D2 P D2 S   vEdanai tarum perum shOdanai varum pOdu AdaravODennai ayara viDAdirukka
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  sAmA)Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  cancala tApangaL minja anjAmal endan nenjam undaniDam tanjam aDainduyya
